DOC.brief_summary: The rationale investigate hypothesis association erectile dysfunction ( ED ) subsequent development prostate cancer base three assumption : 1 ) baseline ED common cross-sectional study men prostate cancer ; 2 ) development ED prostate cancer may certain share common risk factor ; 3 ) use testosterone treatment ED suspect associated prostate cancer development . Controversy exist whether men ED increase risk subsequent prostate cancer . Few study evaluate risk develop prostate cancer men ED . The investigator , therefore , conduct population-based longitudinal study eight year ' follow-up examine association evaluate magnitude risk .
DOC.brief_title: Will Erectile Dysfunction Increase Risk Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: men 50 year old preexist prostate cancer le 50 year old preexisting prostate cancer
